attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should it be the case that a small buisness should be charged the same charge as a large buisness when a overdraw situation occurs.No matter how long this situation occurs for.IE if I overdraw by £10 for 1hour and be charged £35.If a large buisness overdraws by £35,000 the same charge still applies. Should charges not be applied on a sliding scale and more relevent to the size of the overdrawn amount.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
